about.title: About Agata Plura, MA
about.description: I am a psychologist and psychotherapist currently undergoing psychodynamic training. I completed a five-year master's degree in clinical psychology of children and adolescents at SWPS University in Poznań. I continuously develop my competencies, seeking effective methods that allow me to better tailor help to individual needs.
about.experience: I gained experience during internships at the Provincial Hospital for Nervous and Mentally Ill 'Dziekanka', Social Welfare Home, schools, and in Associations supporting people in crisis. I currently work at a Psychological and Pedagogical Counseling Center, where I diagnose and support children and adolescents with emotional, developmental, and educational difficulties.
about.approach: I help people better understand themselves, their emotions, and behavioral patterns, which allows for more conscious decision-making and building satisfying relationships. I support coping with stress, anxiety, and life difficulties, as well as discovering one's potential and internal resources.
